#Text=What in the whole wide world do you mean to  catch " a falling star ?

column1: #Text=" Well , to answer the question , you first have to know how to watch a falling star rise again .
#Text=Everyone knows that in all practicality you really ca n't possibly catch a falling star literally , so do n't try to do that !
#Text=If you 're going to a rooftop building , stay away from the edge .
#Text=Use a chair to sit down and lean back .
#Text=It helps you relax and enjoy the view more .
#Text=A dark comfortable place to watch stars
